sentence.Network_en: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 最初是想用现代景观点缀历史景观。

sentence.Network_en: Intersperse exclamation marks in the text.
sentence.Network_cn: 在文章中加进一些感叹号.

sentence.Network_en: Taking advantage of abstract line, brilliant color and high - sounding intersperse reveals luxurious feature.
sentence.Network_cn: 抽象的线条, 大胆的颜色和夸张的点缀尽显致奢华.

the peach trees were interspersed among the willows ., 桃树被栽在柳树间.
interspecific 中间的intersperse among 散布于intersperse 散布
interspar bracing structure 内梁拉条结构interspersed carbide 敷焊用碳化鸟粉interst =interstial interstade 间冰段

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'diversify (something) by introducing other things at intervals'): from Latin interspers- 'scattered between', from interspergere, from inter- 'between' + spargere 'scatter'

entry.def: If you intersperse one group of things with another or among another, you put or include the second things between or among the first things.

example.ex: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
example.tran: 最初是想用现代景观点缀历史景观。

example.ex: ...skillfully interspersing jokes and gossipy anecdotes among his instructions.
example.tran: 他的讲课中巧妙穿插的笑话和趣闻闲谈

means.word_mean: 1. place at intervals in or among;
2. introduce one's writing or speech with certain expressions

stems_affixes.word_buile: inter在……之间,相互+changeable可改变的→adj.可互换的
inter在…之间+n+al表形容词→adj.内在的, 国内的
inter在……之间,相互+national国家的→adj.国际的
inter在……之间,相互+personal个人的→adj.人与人之间的
inter在……之间,相互+action行动→相互行动→影响
inter在……之间,相互+lud玩+e→在中间玩→活动间休息
inter在……之间,相互+relate关连→n.相互关连
inter在……之间,相互+v+al表形容词→n.间隔, 距离
inter在……之间,相互+pose放→放在二者之间
inter在……之间,相互+sect切割→在中间切→横断
inter在……之间,相互+sperse散开→v.散布,点缀
inter在……之间,相互+ven走+e→走在二者之间→干涉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散布, 驱散, 传播, 散射
stems_affixes.word_buile: disperse[v.[使]分散;[使]散开;疏散]+ion表名词→n.散布, 驱散, 传播, 散射

stems_affixes.value_cn: 散布, 布置, 点缀
stems_affixes.word_buile: intersperse[v.散布,点缀]+ion表名词→n.散布, 布置, 点缀
inter在……中间+spers散开+e→在中间散开

sentences.en: The grass was interspersed with beds of flowers.
sentences.cn: 草地上点缀着许多花坛。
